descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/980/dragonhead.png[/img][/center]
[color=red][center][b]IMPORTANT![/b][/center]
[center]As of now, this is nothing more but a pack of 5 new textures for Dragonscale armor. This is the real full mod, with craftable pieces: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8038[/center][/color]

[color=orange][b]Info Update.[/b][/color]
The full mod is now complete is can be downloaded from: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8038
The texture pack itself will no longer updated, only the full mod will.

[color=orange][b]Update! Version 0.3, Dec. 18 2011:[/b][/color]
*Added 5th version of the armor, in Alduin\'s colors.
*Reworked male Ancient, Frost and Elder armors.
*Added female versions of all 5 armors.

[color=orange][b]Description for the full mod, which is to be released in January:[/b][/color]
The dragons of Skyrim are getting tougher. Seems just like yesterday when you have slain your first typical dragon. But today, they are stronger. Blood, Frost, Elder and Ancient dragons roam the skies, with their vibrant colored scales which are tougher than ever.
But your armor isn\'t. For it was created with the weak scales of a typical brown dragon.
But it is about to change now.
The tougher dragons will now drop higher quality scales upon their death, which you can use to create tougher and prettier dragon armor.

[color=orange]What does[b] this preview have to offer?[/b][/color]
This mod contains 5 sets of new textures for dragonscale armor to briefly demonstrate what to expect from the full mod in January. This preview features both male and female versions of the armor and NO shield.

[color=orange][b]How to install:[/b][/color]
Chose the version you want to use, open the corresponding folder inside the archive and extract the \"textures\" folder into your Skyrim/Data folder. Merge, if asked.


[i]Please keep in mind that this is only a little \"demo\" of the mod, keep your eyes out in January for the full version.[/i]
Please contact me by a pm if you have any problems or suggestions for this mod.
author: Dragten
